name: Haikyu! The Game
description:
Desktop only!
How to play:

Use A-D or Arrow Left - Arrow Right to move
Use Space Bar or Left click to shoot

Credits:
Sprites Made by me
Left Arrow and Right Arrow icons -Png Wings
Left click icon - SVG Repo
Music - 8bitAnime on Youtube 
Kageyama Scream - Draco Malfoy on Youtube 
Hit sound effect - Sound Effect Database on Youtube
